name: Crazy Climber (itch)
description:
Crazy Climber

Your climber is ready to win Html5 sports competition. He has already shown his talent in different sports. He needs your help in this last event of rock climbing. He needs to reach the top safely. There will be some deadly obstacles on the way. Help him to take a safe route to the top!

Move your climber's hands to climb as high as you can before the time runs out.

Controls:

- Mouse or touch ;)

Goog Luck...
